optional.name: file_system_name
optional.description: Current name of the file system

optional.name: name
optional.description: New name of the file system

optional.name: description
optional.description: File system description

optional.name: clear_description
optional.description: Clear the description

optional.name: capacity
optional.description: File system capacity

optional.name: owner_controller
optional.description: Owning controller of the file system

optional.name: io_priority
optional.description: I/O priority of the file system

optional.name: block_size
optional.description: Size of the file system block

optional.name: capacity_threshold
optional.description: File system capacity alarm threshold

optional.name: timing_snapshot_max_number
optional.description: Maximum number of scheduled snapshots

optional.name: snapshot_reserve
optional.description: Percentage of reserved snapshots

optional.name: split_speed
optional.description: Split speed

optional.name: space_self_adjusting_mode
optional.description: Automatic capacity adjustment mode

optional.name: autosize_enable
optional.description: Switch of automatic capacity adjustment

optional.name: auto_shrink_threshold_percent
optional.description: Percentage threshold that triggers automatic reduction

optional.name: auto_grow_threshold_percent
optional.description: Percentage threshold that triggers automatic expansion

optional.name: min_autosize
optional.description: Lower limit of automatic reduction

optional.name: max_autosize
optional.description: Upper limit of automatic expansion

optional.name: autosize_increment
optional.description: Capacity change of a single automatic expansion

optional.name: space_recycle_mode
optional.description: Capacity reclamation mode

optional.name: alloc_type
optional.description: File system type

optional.name: ssd_capacity_upper_limit_of_user_data
optional.description: Upper limit of SSD capacity for storing user data

optional.name: initial_distribute_policy
optional.description: Initial allocation policy for the file system

optional.name: long_filename_enabled
optional.description: Whether to enable the long file name function

optional.name: prefetch_policy
optional.description: Cache prefetch policy

optional.name: prefetch_value
optional.description: Cache prefetch value (KB)

optional.name: prefetch_multiple
optional.description: Cache prefetch multiple

optional.name: security_style
optional.description: Security style supported by the file system

optional.name: unix_permissions
optional.description: UNIX permissions of the file system root directory

optional.name: fs_layer_distribution_algorithm
optional.description: Data distribution algorithm of the file system

optional.name: audit_items
optional.description: Audit items of the file system (comma-separated)

optional.name: quota_switch
optional.description: Quota switch of the file system

optional.name: vstore_id
optional.description: Specified vStore ID

optional.name: nas_locking_policy
optional.description: NAS lock policy in NATIVE security style

optional.name: auto_delete_snapshot_enabled
optional.description: Whether to enable automatic deletion of earliest snapshots

optional.name: character_set
optional.description: Character set configuration of the file system

optional.name: VAAI_switch
optional.description: Whether to enable the VAAI function

mutually_exclusive.description: Either file_system_id or file_system_name must be specified, but not both
Cannot specify both description and clear_description

mandatory.name: dtree_id
mandatory.description: Dtree ID in the format 'File system ID@Dtree ID'. Use 'show dtree general' to obtain the value.

optional.name: user_name
optional.description: User name. Use 'show unix_user general' or 'show windows_user general' to obtain the value.

optional.name: group_name
optional.description: User group name. Use 'show unix_group general' to obtain the value.
